home.parrafo-info: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Economics from Universidad Torcuato Di Tella with a minor in Mathematics and Statistics. Currently, I work as a Data Analyst at CENCOSUD. My professional career is focused on data analysis and collection, with a passion for econometrics and quantitative analysis.

sobre-mi.title: About me
sobre-mi.texto_sobreMi:
I am 23 years old and I reside in the Ciudad Auton√≥ma de Buenos Aires. I obtained my degree in economics in the current year 2023. My fondness for data led me to study various programming languages for their extraction and analysis.
Throughout my professional journey, I have had the opportunity to work in various sectors, exploring areas outside my field of study. However, for the past year and a half, I have been working as a Data Analyst at CENCOSUD.

I consider myself a responsible, hardworking, and solution-oriented person. I have excellent teamwork abilities, always fostering empathy and respect. I enjoy continuous learning and have the capacity to acquire new knowledge quickly and accurately.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: Comprehensive analysis, using the R language, of the operation of the public bicycle system in the city of Buenos Aires in the year 2021.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: Exploration of the composition of the country's financial institutions, focusing on the variables that would explain their profits through a panel data econometrics model.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: A system for automatically obtaining a list of Korean-origin movies and associated data. The code is also used to feed a Twitter bot.
